about: Hi there, I am Mapule Mbuzwana, a Full Stack Developer with a passion for bringing ideas to life. I have experience in both front-end and back-end development.
When I'm not coding, I am creating website templates, watching my favorite shows and enjoying outdoor activities.

hobbies.description: I started selling website templates and ended up falling in love with design and coding
I started reading stories online to pass time, but found myself writing my own story and sharing it

experience.description: I started working as a sales assistant right after high school as I enjoyed working with people
I started working at Excell Hygiene to learn how to manage a business, which led me to my passion for coding as I created my first code for a schedule landing page

testimonials.name: Mordecai
testimonials.quotes: Mapule is a brilliant developer with a love for solving complex problems efficiently.

testimonials.name: Mbalentle
testimonials.quotes: Mapule's is creactive and her dedication is remarkable.

testimonials.name: Amy
testimonials.quotes: Mapule's coding skills and dedication are remarkable.

testimonials.name: Daniel
testimonials.quotes: Mapule is fun to work with and is always ready to help

testimonials.name: Patricia
testimonials.quotes: Mapule is an exceptional developer with great problem-solving skills. A pleasure to mentor.
